articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Celtic vs Utrecht in the UEFA Europa League.
articles.title: Celtic vs Utrecht: UEFA Europa League radio coverage & live text commentary

articles.description: Aston Villa fight back to beat Red Bull Salzburg and finish second in the Europa League league phase, but Ollie Watkins is forced off to compound their injury issues.
articles.title: Aston Villa 3-2 Red Bull Salzburg: Hosts fight back from 2-0 down to win as Ollie Watkins forced off

articles.description: Igor Jesus scores twice as Nottingham Forest round off the league phase of the Europa League with a comfortable win against Ferencvaros at the City Ground.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest 4-0 Ferencvaros - Igor Jesus scores twice in Europa League win

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka keeps her cool to storm past Elina Svitolina and reach a fourth Australian Open final in a row.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Aryna Sabalenka brushes aside Elina Svitolina to reach Melbourne final

articles.description: Already-eliminated Rangers lose an early lead as Porto come back to win 3-1 in the Europa League.
articles.title: Porto vs Rangers: UEFA Europa League radio coverage & live text commentary

articles.description: Crystal Palace's £50m move for Wolves striker Jorgen Strand Larsen is in the balance after the Eagles suggest they could walk away from the deal.
articles.title: Jorgen Strand Larsen: Crystal Palace's £50m move for Wolves striker in doubt

articles.description: Premier League clubs always had the money, but now they also have the know-how they have dominated this season's Champions League.
articles.title: Champions League 2026: How English clubs got smart to dominate this season's league phase

articles.description: Senegal manager Pape Thiaw his banned for five games after the chaotic scenes during the Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco.
articles.title: Pape Thiaw: Senegal manager given five-match ban after Afcon final chaos

articles.description: Jofra Archer returns to the England team to face Sri Lanka in the first T20 match after recovering from injury.
articles.title: Jofra Archer named in England side for first T20 in Sri Lanka

articles.description: Anthony Joshua posts an emotional YouTube video thanking fans for their support following the deaths of his two close friends in a car crash in Nigeria.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua pays emotional tribute in new YouTube video
